channel.title: [PI] 633 itemsCache Packable
channel.description:
ok i followed that guide on 634 items i already did the 633 characters which wokred fine so anyway. i cache packed the object.dat and object.dtx files correctly i also replaced my itemdef.java with his and my model.java with his and added his code into stream .java i also put all of his item models into my raw folder gzipped all of them and now when i try to log in i get this error
[code]NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 177051 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:200) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:845) at Model.<init>(Model.java:395) at Model.method462(Model.java:1023) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:498) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:383) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8660) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2038) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8455) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9203) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4839) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]

item.title: [PI] 633 itemsCache Packable
item.dc:creator: @master_roshi master roshi
item.description:

ok i followed that guide on 634 items i already did the 633 characters which wokred fine so anyway. i cache packed the object.dat and object.dtx files correctly i also replaced my itemdef.java with his and my model.java with his and added his code into stream .java i also put all of his item models into my raw folder gzipped all of them and now when i try to log in i get this error
